headerDisplay:
This is a plugin that integrates your Pioneer AVR as a TV accessory in HomeKit. To use the network scan (Multicast), ensure that `pioneerAvrAccessory` is removed from `config.json`, and leave `ip` field empty in the plugin configuration.
If the old plugin `pioneerAvrAccessory` was previously installed and your configuration is still listed under `accessory` instead of `platforms`, please update your `config.json` by removing any outdated configurations under `accessory` to ensure the plugin functions correctly.
This plugin is specifically designed for Pioneer models released before 2017 that use Pioneer Telnet Commands (e.g., VSX-922). It may not be compatible with newer models that use the ISCP protocol (e.g., VSX-LX304). For newer models, please consider using the [homebridge-onkyo-pioneer](https://github.com/nitaybz/homebridge-onkyo-pioneer) plugin.
